title: Adventure Music Pack 2
description: Adventure music perfect for exploring a Mayan temple or traveling down the Nile River.
longDescription:
Second in the series, Adventure Music Pack 2 includes: 

LISTEN

• Music perfect for exploring a Mayan temple or traveling down the Nile River. 

• Music composed using instruments from the Middle East, South American and traditional orchestration. 

• Main tracks are broken down into sub loops to give the user a broader spectrum of music. 

• Fading music tracks perfect for game trailers and YouTube videos. 

• Bumpers and Stingers “additional track versions” perfect for game endings or transitions. 


Number of Audio Wavs: 38

Number of Audio Cues: 38

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs


All my music/audio products are YouTube content ID Free, this means you should never receive a copyright claim from another channel when posting videos to YouTube that include my music. If any issues ever arise please reach out to michael@mlamanna.com.
technicalDetails:
Seamless looping music tracks included: 

1. Escape - Full Loop Version 

- Escape - Ambient Loop Version 

2. Old Gods - Full Loop Version 

- Old Gods - Combat Loop Version 

3. Primeval - Full Loop Version 

- Primeval - Ambient Loop Version 1 

- Primeval - Ambient Loop Version 2 

- Primeval - Looping Percussion 

- Primeval - Looping Percussion no Ambience 

4. Shamnbhala - Full Loop Version 

- Shamnbhala - Full Loop Version no Percussion 

- Shamnbhala - Percussion Loop Version 

5. The Catacomb - Full Loop Version 

- The Catacomb - Ambient Loop Version 

- The Catacomb - Combat loop Version 1 

- The Catacomb - Combat loop Version 2 

6. The Ancients - Full Loop Version

- The Ancients - Edit Loop Version

- The Ancient - Ambient Loop Version

7. Witch Doctor - Full Loop Version

Fading music tracks included: 

1. Escape 

2. Old Gods 

3. Primeval 

4. Shambhala 

5. The Catacomb 

6. The Ancients

7. Witch Doctor

Addition music track versions included:

- Escape - Bumper 

2. Primeval - Stinger 

- Primeval - Bumper 

3. Shambhala - Stinger 

- Shambhala - Bumper
